short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate Google Drive™ documents to Geocaching.com to enhance notes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will fully integrate a Google Document into Geocaching.com. This way you can make advanced notes for puzzles and multies.

You can create a new document from the Geocache page itself in geocaching.com with a single click! You can use (styled) long text, tables, images, just like in Office. You can make use these on the go, with an internet connection, or even make them available offline with the Google Drive app.

It will automatically create a folder named "Geocaching" inside your Google Drive.

The Groundspeak Geocaching Logo is a registered trademark of Groundspeak, Inc (http://www.groundspeak.com). Used with permission.

I do not have any relation with Geocaching.com and do not work at Geocaching.com! Also have no relation with Google!
